attributes.action: make the awareness of solvent abuse avaliable in secondary schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In June 2004, 16 year-old Danielle Taylor died after inhaling from a can of air freshener. This was the first time she had tried it.

Her dad Bryn, 43, believes she'd be here today if she had been educated about the dangers of solvent abuse.

This is very likely NOT the first case but for god's sake let it be the last. 

I ask you, that we make the awareness of solvent abuse of EVERY kind to be explained in every detail in secondary schools.
